internships.title: Internship at Ministry
internships.description: General internship at ministry level

internships.title: Internship Scheme
internships.description: Work with India's top policy-making body. This internship offers a chance to learn about governance and contribute to research on important national issues like agriculture, health, and education.

internships.title: Digital India Internship Scheme
internships.description: Get hands-on experience working on live projects related to the Digital India mission. This is a great opportunity for technology students to learn about e-Governance and digital transformation in India.

internships.title: RGSA Internship Program
internships.description: Learn about governance at the village level (Panchayati Raj). This internship provides experience in rural development policies, data analysis, and how local governments work to improve villages.

internships.title: Abhijit Sen Rural Internship
internships.description: A unique 50-day field-based research internship. You will travel to rural areas, live with local communities, and conduct research on social and economic challenges faced by them.

internships.title: Internship Programme
internships.description: Work with one of India's largest education NGOs. As an intern, you will support the program team in tasks like research, data analysis, documentation, and communication to improve education for children.

internships.title: Internship Programme
internships.description: Join one of India's most trusted NGOs and work towards ensuring happy, healthy, and creative childhoods for all children. Internships are available in areas like research, data analytics, content writing, and design.

internships.title: Internship Scheme
internships.organization: Ministry of Environment, Forest & Climate Change
internships.description: Work with the central ministry responsible for protecting India's environment. This internship offers exposure to policies on forests, wildlife, and climate change.

internships.title: LAMP Fellowship
internships.description: A highly prestigious fellowship where you work as a full-time research assistant to a Member of Parliament (MP). You will help the MP with research for debates, questions in Parliament, and drafting bills.

internships.title: Internship Programme
internships.description: Gain hands-on experience with the United Nations agency for children. Work on projects related to child health, education, and protection, and contribute to a global mission.

internships.title: Internship Programme
internships.description: Contribute to advancing public health by interning with the WHO. Gain insight into technical and administrative programs in areas like public health, medical research, and communications.

internships.title: Short-term Internship Programme
internships.description: Learn about human rights and how the NHRC works to protect them. This internship exposes students, especially from law, to the process of handling complaints and raising awareness on human rights issues.

internships.title: Competition Law Internship
internships.description: Understand how the CCI regulates markets and ensures fair competition in the economy. This internship is for students of economics, law, and management to get practical knowledge of competition law.

internships.title: Internship Programme
internships.description: Get a unique opportunity to learn about India's foreign policy. This internship allows you to see how the MEA works and how India engages with the world.

internships.title: Digital India Internship for NIC
internships.description: A hands-on technical internship at NIC, the backbone of government IT infrastructure. You will work on designing UI/UX for government websites, apps, and other digital products.

internships.title: Technical Internship Programme
internships.description: Work on live e-Governance projects and develop your technical skills in a professional environment. Opportunities are available in areas like UI/UX design, software testing, database programming, AI/ML, and DevOps.

internships.title: Internship Programme
internships.description: Intern with Bhumi to understand how the non-profit sector works and develop leadership skills. You will get hands-on learning in your chosen field and contribute to social change.

internships.title: Internship Programme
internships.description: Gain practical experience in projects that empower children and communities in rural areas of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana. Internships available in project management, content writing, social media, and fundraising.

internships.title: Internship Programme
internships.description: Contribute to conservation projects of national and global importance with WWF-India. This is an opportunity to work on protecting priority species and critical regions.

internships.title: Internship Programme
internships.description: Enhance your research skills in environmental protection and policy. This internship exposesä½  to advocacy campaigns and local project initiatives for environmental conservation.

internships.title: Policy Research Intern
internships.organization: Centre for Public Research and Governance (CPRG)
internships.description: An unpaid internship for those interested in social sciences and public policy. You will provide research, writing, and editing support on various policy issues and help organize events.

internships.title: ICPC Internship Programme
internships.description: Explore the basics of policymaking, politics, and governance through a mix of online training and in-office experience. You will work in political offices and with organizers.

internships.title: Internship Programme
internships.description: Gain practical experience in international development with the UNDP. Internships provide a taste of UNDP's work in areas like poverty reduction, democratic governance, and sustainable development.

internships.title: Financial Services Internship
internships.organization: Dept. of Financial Services, Ministry of Finance
internships.description: An opportunity for students of Economics, Finance, and Law to learn about the financial sector in India. Interns will interact with Public Sector Banks, Insurance Companies, and other Financial Institutions.

internships.title: Medical Internship (MBBS)
internships.description: An internship for Foreign Medical Graduates (FMGs) to undergo compulsory rotating residential internship training at one of Delhi's premier government hospitals.
